fixed_skill.desc: Deal Psy damage to 1 foe equal to 122.0/126.9/131.8% of Attack. Deal a Technical and increase damage by 40% for foes with a spiritual ailment.
fixed_skill.name: Psio

innate_skill.desc: 65.1/68.4/71.6% chance to inflict Forget on 1 foe for 2 turns.
innate_skill.name: Makajama

innate_skill.desc: Increase Speed by 9. Decrease Defense by 4%.
innate_skill.name: Agility Master II

innate_skill.desc: Deal Psy damage to all foes equal to 66.4/68.8/71.2% of Attack. Deal a Technical and increase damage by 40% for foes with a spiritual ailment.
innate_skill.name: Mapsio

passive_skill.desc: Increase Attack by 11.6%. Decrease SP cost of Psychokinesis skills by 27%.
passive_skill.name: Psychic Bloodline

passive_skill.desc: Increase Attack by 11.6%. Decrease SP cost of Psychokinesis skills by 31%.
passive_skill.name: Psychic Bloodline I

passive_skill.desc: Increase Attack by 11.6%. Decrease SP cost of Psychokinesis skills by 35%.
passive_skill.name: Psychic Bloodline II

showtime_skill.desc: Deal Psychokinesis damage to all foes equal to 90.0%/96.3%/102.6% of Attack. Increase damage taken by 19.6%/21.0%/22.3% for 2 turns.
showtime_skill.name: Highlight
